summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test with a duration of 1038ms. It is recommended to investigate the cause of this failure and optimize the page to improve its load time.
insights: The passed pages have acceptable load times, but there is still room for improvement to further optimize the pages for better user experience.
The failed "How It Works" page needs immediate attention to identify and fix the issues causing the longer load time.
It is important to regularly monitor and test the web performance of all pages to ensure optimal user experience and identify any potential issues early on.
